name: apocalypse verse
description:
inspired by the words of the prophet Muhammad which reads:
'People will be gathered on the Day of Resurrection barefoot, naked and uncircumcised.
then :
“On the Day of Resurrection, mankind will be gathered on a level ground like white bread, which is round and flat; no sign for anyone."

This is a narrative work that results from reflecting on the types of processes that occurred during the COVID-19 pandemic, and the beliefs held by humans were violently shaken back in ancient times where the most important thing was not to die. This refers to Fundamentalists who have to compromise with their beliefs that are shaken by the events of a real scientific disaster, and the belief held by scientists that: "knowledge is the commander that can save the human species" must compromise with the interests of businessmen as well as greedy politicians, then ordinary people who save each other without caring about others and even eat each other like cockroaches.
